params._withdrawData: custom withdraw data; ignore if you need to withdraw on the same chain
params.withdraw_: if true, withdraws from YieldBox to `msg.sender`
if true withdraws to sender address

depositAddCollateralAndBorrow(address,ui.notice: deposts collateral to YieldBox, adds collateral to Singularity, borrows and can withdraw to personal address

depositAndAddAsset(address,uint256).notice: deposits asset to YieldBox and lends it to Singularity

depositAndRepay(address,uint256,uint256).notice: deposits to YieldBox and repays borrowed amount

depositRepayAndRemoveCollateral(address,.notice: deposits to YieldBox, repays borrowed amount and removes collateral
